item.title: YouBike - An amazing bike-sharing system in Taiwan
item.description: YouBike (or Ubike) is my first choice of transportation when it comes to move around the city of Taipei. I largely prefer it over taking the subway, bus or taxi. It is affordable, well maintained, comfortable, at waking distance reach from anywhere, and the cities has built great biking paths in the major cities. The number of YouBike rides keeps increasing steadily since it was launched in 2012. There was 170 millions rides since it was introduced in 2012, and last month it reached ~3 millions rides in Taipei:
